casebody.data:
BAXTER WRECKING CORPORATION, Ll-belant-Appellant, v. Steamship ROYAL ARROW; Standard Transportation Company, Claimant-Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. October 15, 1928. No. 11. Macklin, Brown, Lenahan & Speer, of New York City (Horace L. Cheyney, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Peter M. Speer, of New York City (Chauncey I. Clark and Courtland Palmer, both of New York City, of counsel), for ap-pellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
